value.title: PowerBI.Tips - Tutorial - Dual Y Axis Chart
value.excerpt: Make a custom visual to have two Y-Axis scales in Power BI.  This chart was made using https://charts.powerbi.tips  Blog Post: https://powerbi.tips/2019/09/dual-y-axis-line-chart/ Visit PowerBI.Tips: https://powerbi.tips/  Source files for this project are located here on GitHub:  https://github.com/MikeCarlo/PowerBI-Dual-y-axis-Line-Chart

value.title: PowerBI.Tips - Tutorial - Model Performance Tuning in DAX Studio - By Marco Russo
value.excerpt: DAX Studio is the tool for data model tuning.  Marco Russo contributor to DAX Studio will be giving us a deep dive and demo around using DAX Studio for Model Performance Tuning.   You will not want to miss this event as Marco is a wealth of knowledge for all things Data Modeling!  Watch the Full Tutorial

value.title: PowerBI.Tips - Tutorial - Using Scripts in Tabular Editor
value.excerpt: Tabular Editor is an incredible Tool that enables users to manipulate a Tabular Model at lighting speeds.  Daniel Otykier is the creator of Tabular Editor.  In this video Daniel will explain how to effectively use scripting to automate repetitive tasks.    Scripting is by far the most powerful part of

value.title: 3 Minutes Learning: Sort Month in Power BI
